title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta until crispy, then remove from heat.
Whisk eggs and pecorino in a bowl.
Drain spaghetti and toss with pancetta and egg-cheese mix off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spice for 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked and slightly charred.
Sauté onion, add tomatoes and simmer to make sauce.
Stir in cream and add cooked chicken to the sauce.
Simmer 5 minutes, garnish with cilantro and serve with rice.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce served over noodles.
ingredients: 400g beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
steps: Season the beef strips and brown them in a hot pan, then set aside.
Sauté onions and garlic in butter until soft.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Sprinkle flour and stir to form a roux.
Add sour cream and simmer to form a thick sauce.
Return the beef to the pan and simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve over cooked noodles or rice.
